text:
[Verse]
I walk this lonely road today
Sun is shining and I'm okay
Whispers of the wind they say
Dreams are just a breath away

[Verse 2]
Flowers bloom in every shade
Coloring the path I've made
Steps are light as if I’m swayed
By the songs that trees have played

[Chorus]
Dreaming in the daylight
Holding on to what's right
Shadows fade and take flight
Living in the bright light

[Verse 3]
Birds above they sing so clear
Melodies for all to hear
Skies of blue they draw me near
In this world there’s nothing to fear

[Bridge]
Eyes are open
See the sights
Hearts are free
Soaring heights
In the day
Through the nights
Find the joy in simple delights

[Chorus]
Dreaming in the daylight
Holding on to what's right
Shadows fade and take flight
Living in the bright light
title: Dreaming in the Daylight
